description: Migrate all ERB views to Phlex components
rationale: 29 ERB files exist alongside Phlex components creating inconsistent patterns
acceptance_criteria: No ERB files in app/views except layouts/application.html.erb and mailer templates
Consistent component patterns across all views

description: Standardize button styling using RubyUI::Button component
steps: Audit all button usage across components
Replace with RubyUI::Button using appropriate variants

description: Standardize form styling using RubyUI::Form components
rationale: Forms use mix of raw form helpers and RubyUI form components
acceptance_criteria: All forms use FormField, FormFieldLabel, FormFieldHint components
Remove inline Tailwind classes for form elements

description: Optimize dashboard for mobile-first experience
rationale: Dashboard should prioritize quick actions on mobile devices
acceptance_criteria: Quick actions (Take Medicine) prominently displayed at top
Stats cards stack vertically on mobile
Table converts to card layout on mobile

description: Implement mobile-friendly navigation
rationale: Navigation should be easily accessible on mobile devices
acceptance_criteria: Bottom navigation bar for primary actions

description: Prioritize quick actions and summary info at page headers
rationale: Users need immediate access to primary actions without scrolling
acceptance_criteria: Page headers include primary action button
Key metrics/counts shown in header area
Secondary actions in dropdown or below fold

description: Remove duplicate action buttons
rationale: Multiple buttons performing same action confuse users
acceptance_criteria: Single 'Add' button per resource type per page
Edit/Delete actions consolidated in dropdown or action column
Consistent action placement across all pages

description: Return to previous page after form submission
rationale: Users expect to return to their previous context after editing
acceptance_criteria: Store referrer URL before showing edit form
Redirect to referrer after successful save
Fall back to resource index if no referrer
Cancel button returns to previous page

description: Minimize full page reloads using Turbo Frames and Streams
rationale: Full page reloads create jarring UX and slow perceived performance
acceptance_criteria: CRUD operations use Turbo Streams for inline updates
Flash messages update via Turbo Stream

description: Implement optimistic UI updates
rationale: Immediate feedback improves perceived performance
acceptance_criteria: Button shows loading state on click

description: Maximize RubyUI component usage
rationale: RubyUI provides consistent, accessible components
acceptance_criteria: All UI elements use RubyUI components where available
Custom components extend RubyUI base patterns

description: Remove unused files and dead code
rationale: Unused files add confusion and maintenance burden

description: Create shared component library for common patterns
rationale: Repeated patterns should be extracted to reusable components
acceptance_criteria: Common patterns extracted to shared components

description: Implement swipe gestures for mobile actions
rationale: Mobile users expect gesture-based interactions
acceptance_criteria: Swipe left to reveal delete action on list items
Swipe right to reveal quick action (e.g., Take Medicine)
Pull to refresh on list pages

description: Improve form validation feedback
rationale: Users need clear, immediate feedback on form errors

description: Standardize icon usage with Lucide icons
rationale: Consistent iconography improves visual coherence
acceptance_criteria: All icons from Lucide icon set

description: Add breadcrumb navigation
rationale: Users need context of their location in the app

description: Implement bottom sheet for mobile forms
rationale: Bottom sheets are more ergonomic on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Forms open in bottom sheet on mobile
Full screen option for complex forms

description: Add global search functionality
rationale: Quick access to any resource improves efficiency

description: Implement dark mode support
rationale: Dark mode reduces eye strain and is expected by users

description: Consolidate and clean up CSS
rationale: Mixed CSS approaches create maintenance burden
acceptance_criteria: Migrate custom styles to Tailwind utilities

description: Ensure keyboard navigation works throughout
rationale: Keyboard users must be able to navigate all features

description: Add toast notifications for async actions
rationale: Users need feedback for background operations

description: Enhance PWA experience
rationale: PWA provides native-like experience on mobile
